properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID,MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NM, TO_CHAR(MEMBER_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_NICK, PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_LIVE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND SECESSION_FL ='N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NICK = ? AND SECESSION_FL ='N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_PHONE = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NICK = ?, MEMBER_PHONE = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO=?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE MEMBER_PW = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
